original_text: He made the buildings in Tadmor strong again. That was a town in the wilderness. He did the same thing for the towns that he had built in Hamath region to store things.
korean_text: 또 광야에서 다드몰을 건축하고 하맛에서 모든 국고성들을 건축하고

sentences.original_text: He made the buildings in Tadmor strong again
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다드모르의 건물들을 다시 견고하게 만들었다

sentences.original_text: That was a town in the wilderness
He did the same thing for the towns
that he had built in Hamath region
